name: GcsToFirestore
description: A template to read messages from GCS and write to Firestore

parameters.name: gcsPath
parameters.label: Path
parameters.helpText: GCS path for the file to be loaded

parameters.name: failTopic
parameters.label: Data Loss Topic
parameters.helpText: PubSub fail data path for the file to be loaded

parameters.name: typeMappingPath
parameters.label: TypeMapping Path
parameters.helpText: GCS TypeMapping path for the file to be loaded
